identity.mission: Create a 'Tactical Finance' desktop experience that feels like a high-end command center, not a generic admin panel.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Bloomberg Terminal' density with 'Gaming UI' responsiveness.
Emotion First: Security and Efficiency. Every pixel must scream 'Reliable'.
Content is King: Data legibility is paramount. SA ID numbers and Currency must be distinct.
Contrast: High contrast for critical alerts (Fraud), subtle contrast for hierarchy.

typography.instructions: Use 'Manrope' for all page titles and section headers. Use 'Inter' for labels and paragraphs. CRITICAL: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL financial data, South African ID numbers, and Loan Reference IDs to ensure character distinctiveness (0 vs O, 1 vs l).

usage_rules.background: Use #09090B for the main app background. Never use pure black #000000.
usage_rules.cards: Use #18181B for card backgrounds with a 1px border of #27272A.
usage_rules.primary: Use Emerald Green (#10B981) for 'Success', 'Money', and primary 'Create/Save' actions.
usage_rules.destructive: Use Signal Red (#EF4444) for 'Fraud Alerts', 'Overdue', and 'Delete' actions.
usage_rules.accent: Use Indigo (#6366F1) for focus rings and active navigation states.
usage_rules.text: Never use pure white #FFFFFF for body text; use #A1A1AA (Zinc 400) to reduce eye strain.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-white/10 on all cards and containers. No fuzzy shadows.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-md (6px) for a sharp, professional feel. Avoid fully rounded 'pill' buttons unless it's a status badge.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-black/50' for sticky headers and modal overlays only. Do not overuse.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid gradients on backgrounds. Use subtle linear gradients on primary buttons only (e.g., 'bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-600 to-emerald-500').
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-none' generally. For active/hover states, use a 'glow' effect: 'shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(16,185,129,0.3)]' for primary actions.

layout.spacing: Compact. Use 'gap-4' for grids. Padding 'p-4' or 'p-6' for cards. Avoid 'p-8' or larger to maximize screen real estate for data.

structure.main_content: Fluid width. Scrollable independent of sidebar.
structure.dashboard: Grid layout. Top row: Key Stats (4 cols). Middle: Recent Activity (2 cols) + Fraud Alerts (2 cols). Bottom: Quick Actions.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium border border-input
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md

inputs.base: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use lighter grays (#A1A1AA) on dark backgrounds, never dark gray.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings are MANDATORY. Use 'focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-accent'.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present (e.g., icon buttons).

media.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.
media.images: No heavy imagery. Use abstract geometric patterns or subtle noise textures for empty states if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/manrope', '@fontsource/inter', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to use the specific colors defined in the 'colors' section above. Map 'primary' to Emerald-500 and 'destructive' to Red-500.
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'radius' to '0.375rem' (rounded-md) and ensure borders are visible in dark mode.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the 'SidebarLayout' component first. It should persist across all pages.
5. DATA DISPLAY: For the 'Loan List' and 'Audit Log', use the Table component with 'JetBrains Mono' for ID columns.
6. FRAUD ALERTS: Create a dedicated 'FraudAlert' component that uses the 'destructive' color palette and shakes slightly on mount.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to every button, input, and link.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Do not center-align the main app container.
Ensure all inputs have a clear label.
Dark mode is the DEFAULT and ONLY mode for this internal tool.
